modName: Ultimate ENB made in Germany                                        oO
summary:
I combined some files of different ENB's. At the end, this Ultimate ENB was born.
It took me a long time of trial and error to get this beautiful result.

--Gamesripper1983 aka Schlitzer Mc Goerk 83--

P.S.: All pictures are real desktop-captures, nothing changed or optimized. -_-

Have a nice day in S
descriptionHtml:
[center] [color=silver] [font=Verdana][/font]


[img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/unbenannt9nsbvy75oc.png[/img]

[size=+2.5][color=red] Don't panic if your System is weaker then mine. [/color]

[color=Crimson] PERFORMANCE TUNING[/color]
[color=lime]The [u]default settings[/u] of my ENB are [u]ULTRA HIGH[/u] (everything high, plus some extra tweaks, like the grass distance etc.-->Ultra high!). If your System can't get the fps over 25, you first should try [u]my settings[/u], which are shown on the [u]two pictures in my zip file.[/u] If the fps still aren't high enough, you should lower the resolution to:
[u]1360x765![/u]
Then your fps should be about 40, or even more.

[img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/memegtfo00283o9ayw7l8tu.png[/img]
If not: "Go out and buy a new computer." ;-)[/color]

[color=white][u]READ[/u] THE README !!!!!!!!!![/color]

[color=gold]ENDORSE, IF YOU LIKE[/color]

[url=http://www.gif-paradies.de][img]http://www.gif-paradies.de/gifs/homepage/thanks/thanks_0021.gif[/img][/url][/size]
[size=+1.8]
[url=http://www.gif-paradies.de][img]http://www.gif-paradies.de/gifs/smilies/2d_freizeit/freizeit_smilie_0013.gif[/img][/url]
My System:
CPU: Core i5-4570
RAM: 16 GB DDR 3
GPU: GTX 770

[img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/moviesy61mgo2fr9.jpg[/img]

streamed on [color=Darkorange]My[/color]Video.de

[color=Crimson]ATTENTION:[/color][color=Yellowgreen] In the following movies all settings are at their maximum
+ 1080p and fov=75!
My intention is to show you the maximum possible
graphic you "can get" with my ENB,
-->powerfull PC provided! ;-)[/color]
[color=lime]PERFORMANCE TUNING
-->READ THE INTRODUCTION. ;-)[/color]

[b][color=Yellowgreen]NOW, ENJOY MY MOVIES:[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9180939/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO][color=Yellowgreen]MOVIE ONE:[/color]--Whiterun Night-- HQ[/url]
[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9180939/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO][img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/whiterunnightpl2f61hons.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9180783/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO_ice][color=Yellowgreen]MOVIE TWO:[/color]--Ice-- HQ[/url]
[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9180783/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO_ice][img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/icegmpqhxt420.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9181184/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO_Whiterun_day][color=Yellowgreen]MOVIE THREE:[/color]--Whiterun Day-- HQ[/url]
[url=http://www.myvideo.de/watch/9181184/Ultimate_ENB_made_in_Germany_oO_Whiterun_day][img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/whiterundayfgc48j12xl.jpg[/img][/url]


[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hjg9MXHfjds]
[color=Yellowgreen]MOVIE FOUR:[/color]--TESTVIDEO from "SteelGaming"-->on YOUTUBE-- HQ[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hjg9MXHfjds]
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/testmoviep51kx9jnz2.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=Crimson]READ CAREFULLY:[/color][/b] [color=gold]
These mods are required:[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043//?[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930//?!]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930//?[/url]!

[color=lime]At the first gamestart[/color] (with my files unziped in your gamefolder + the Enhanced Lights and FX mod installed), you have to [color=gold]go to the ingame brightness setting.[/color] Move it one step left or right and press 2x ESC.

[color=lime]After that,[/color]the game takes over my settings. Now it looks like it should :-).
Set the brightness level, depending on your personal liking. Press F5 to save those settings.
[u]Maybe[/u] you have to repeat those 3 steps after a game restart.

[color=gold]Last, but not least:[/color]
[color=Crimson] Backup your old SkyrimPrefs.ini
[/color]--> if your fps are too bad you can step back to your previous and faster SkyrimPrefs.ini!

Thats all folks, have a nice day in Skyrim.

[img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/install7ad4l380mi.jpg[/img]

[color=Crimson]First:[/color] Download this ENB-Series (press [ctrl] + left MB to oben page in new tab ;-)
--> [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0117.htm]http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0117.htm[/url]

[color=gold]Important:[/color]
Only extract the d3d9.dll file (inside the "Wrapper Version" folder!), from the zip-file (downloaded from the link above) into your game folder: "C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrim"!

[color=Crimson]Second:[/color] Download my ENB zip file.
[color=gold]Follow the instructions of the readme file.[/color]

[color=Crimson]Optional:[/color] If you like gloomier caves, taverns and dungeons
-->this mod and mine go very well together: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11353//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11353//?[/url]

[color=gold] Other problems? Post it to me, I try my best to help you out! PROMISED[/color]

[img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/famewxrlfuo843.jpg[/img]
Pictures from: [color=gold]ambosiris[/color]
Quote: "Perfect ENB , i really enjoyed it."

[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/screenshot502zbv8wrylft0.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/screenshot152zyq8iszdfva.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/screenshot92zpefnv2curwq.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/screenshot62zpf5b2t0h4no.png[/img][/url]

Picture from: [color=gold]vegeta25[/color]
Quote: "It is a awsome mod."
[img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/9llrer26lu9bmo.jpg[/img]

My personal pictures
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/38075113737432jeiu50n6v.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=silver][b]KNOCKS THE STRONGEST OFF THEIR FEED[/b] [/color]
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/3807511373350k1rfzd8n0g.jpg[/img][/url]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=lime]I also included the "ENB Customizer v2.exe"-->you can edit my preset, but don't touch the AO amount, otherwise you get the "snow texture" problem ;-)[/color]

[color=gold]Have fun with my Ultimate ENB.[/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red]PERSONAL EVIDENCE:[/color] I would like to see, what your Skyrim looks like after you
installed my Ultimate ENB settings.
Everybody is invited to upload a beautiful screenshot-->[color=gold]show your personal result.[/color] :-)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]For anyone of you who wonders, that it doesn't look the same like on my pictures.[/b]

I have uploaded 4 Pictures with my additional installed mods. The ENB is just the beginning...

But the color, saturation, contrast, lumasharpen and all that stuff is still the same WITHOUT
those additional mods! ;-)

After the Installation of those additional mods (+ an HD-Texture Pack you prefer
-->I endorse you that one: Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by NebuLa), your Skyrim
looks exactly like mine.

THE EFFORT IS WORTH IT >>>PROMISED<<<< (look at my pictures oO)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Greetings from Germany (Swabian) to the Skyrim Community.

Version 1.4: Battlestar1965 helped me to fix some problems! Thanks a million, dude. :-)

Thanks to all the Guys, who developed this page.

Nice work.

I LIKE NEXUSMODS :-) [/size] [/color] [/center]
